sentences.cn: 在人生旅途的露宿营帐.
在人生征途的露宿营地.

sentences.en: In the world's broad field of battle, In the bivouac of Life.
sentences.cn: 在这人生的宿营地, 在这辽阔的世界战场.

sentences.en: Mr. Bates asked Nathan to explain to the class how to build a bivouac for shelter.
sentences.cn: 贝茨先生要内森告诉大家怎样做帐篷.

sentences.en: The company was supposed to bivouac overnight and then return to the post the next day.
sentences.cn: 预期这个连当天在野外露营,次日返回驻地.

sentences.en: The party established six more camps on the south - east ridge . Camp IX was a bivouac.
sentences.cn: 探险队在东南山脊建立了6个营地,还建立了露营地9号营.

sentences.en: There is a semi - circular bivouac tent on the grass.
sentences.cn: 草地上有个 半圆形 的野营帐篷.

sentences.en: Were they to throw together a bivouac on the moon's frozen surface, or simply wander the wastes like some misguided flock until the mechas' power and life-support systems failed?
sentences.cn: 他们是在卫星冰冷的地面上集体露营，还是如同迷途的羊群一般在荒野漫步，直到飞机动力耗尽、生命支持系统失效呢？

sentences.en: While in bivouac, we spent the night in our sleeping bags under the stars.
sentences.cn: 在临时宿营地, 我们就头顶星星,躺在睡袋里过夜.

sentences.en: Your bivouac for the night is spot where you got tired of marching that day.
sentences.cn: 你夜间的宿营地是你白天行军行累了的地方.

sentences.en: Your bivouac for the night is the spot where you got tired of marching that day.
sentences.cn: 你夜间的宿营地是你白天行军累了的地方.

trans.tran_en: a temporary camp built outside without any tents
